title: Bug 18285 - Doubleclicking on import statement transfers to referenced type
OB: In the package view outline, doubleclicking on a type import statement should open the editor on the unit hosting the import reference.
EB: Build 20020528, doubleclicking on a type import statement opens the editor on the target type, instead of the unit hosting the import reference.
SR: Update the behavior of doubleclicking on import statements in the package view outline to open the editor on the unit hosting the import reference.
